document.full_text: senators john kerry and john mccain introduced a tough new privacy bill on tuesday that would require companies to notify consumers in clear language when their data is being collected and oblige them to keep that information safe from hackers.
document.title: john mccain, john kerry introduce contentious u.s. privacy bill
lines_and_colors: senators john kerry and john mccain introduced a tough new privacy bill on tuesday that would require companies to notify consumers in clear language when their data is being collected and oblige them to keep that information safe from hackers.
